categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Argog was a male Gran Sith Acolyte of the Sith Academy on Korriban.

During the Cold War, Argog was discovered by the Sith Empire and was forcibly taken from his home planet to face the Sith trials. He was taken in by Overseer Harkun upon arrival and placed in a group three other acolytes to be presented as potential apprentices to Lord Kallig. Insulted by Harkun due to his home planet and native language, Argog was successful in the first bout of the trials, but was killed in the second.
